 (c) Patrick Schaefer, 2016

  2 - print hex dump
  3 - print Intel Hex file
Select function: 3

COPSreader V0.99
 (c) Patrick Schaefer, 2016

  1 - read COP400 ROM
  2 - print hex dump
  3 - print Intel Hex file
